title: Rookie Standouts: Zion, Herro, Morant, Barrett, and More! Plus: KAT’s Next Step | Group Chat
description:
With the regular season right around the corner, we examine the rookies with the most outstanding preseason performances (1:09). Then, we discuss the career trajectory of Minnesota Timberwolves superstar Karl-Anthony Towns (35:41).

Host: Justin Verrier
Guest: Jonathan Tjarks

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
